oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John H. Morgan correspondence, 1863 June 24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Morgan, John Hunt, 1825-1864
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Response from Brigadier General Morgan to the 1863 June 17 reports of theft and destruction from Colonel Hughs. Includes information about who received and forwarded the original complaint and Brigadier General Morgan's response.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Destruction and pillage
Hughs, John M.
Confederate States of America. Army
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder military records and correspondence, 1862-1865
